actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the Florida Trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, under the National Trails System Act, to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the 1,300-mile Florida Trail as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study with respect to the feasibility of establishing the Florida Trail as a national scenic trail.
